import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Home.css' import axios from 'axios' function Home() { const [data,setData] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:5000/').then(res=>setData(res.data)).catch(err=>console.log(err)) }) return (

Student

{data.map((d,i)=>( ))}
ID Name Phone Major Action
{d.id} {d.fname} {d.lname} {d.phone} {d.major_id}
) } export default Home
